author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Add Pixel-only and HCAL-only GPU validation workflows:
  - Pixel only: `#.503` (quadruplets), `#.507` (triplets)
  - HCAL only: `#.523`

Enable the existing Pixel-only and HCAL-only profiling workflows:
  - Pixel only: `#.504` (quadruplets), `#.508` (triplets)
  - HCAL only: `#.524`

#### PR validation:

The new workflows ran successfully:
```
$ runTheMatrix.py -w gpu -l 11634.503,11634.507,11634.513,11634.523 -j 4 -t 4
...
11634.503_TTbar_14TeV+2021_Patatrack_PixelOnlyGPU_Validation+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSim+Digi+RecoNano+HARVESTNano Step0-PASSED Step1-PASSED Step2-PASSED Step3-PASSED  - time date Wed Mar 30 14:45:30 2022-date Wed Mar 30 14:41:34 2022; exit: 0 0 0 0
11634.507_TTbar_14TeV+2021_Patatrack_PixelOnlyTripletsGPU_Validation+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSim+Digi+RecoNano+HARVESTNano Step0-PASSED Step1-PASSED Step2-PASSED Step3-PASSED  - time date Wed Mar 30 14:45:30 2022-date Wed Mar 30 14:41:34 2022; exit: 0 0 0 0
11634.513_TTbar_14TeV+2021_Patatrack_ECALOnlyGPU_Validation+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSim+Digi+RecoNano+HARVESTNano Step0-PASSED Step1-PASSED Step2-PASSED Step3-PASSED  - time date Wed Mar 30 14:45:26 2022-date Wed Mar 30 14:41:35 2022; exit: 0 0 0 0
11634.523_TTbar_14TeV+2021_Patatrack_HCALOnlyGPU_Validation+TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSim+Digi+RecoNano+HARVESTNano Step0-PASSED Step1-PASSED Step2-PASSED Step3-PASSED  - time date Wed Mar 30 14:45:26 2022-date Wed Mar 30 14:41:35 2022; exit: 0 0 0 0
4 4 4 4 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 failed
````
title: Add Pixel-only and HCAL-only validation workflows
